duties_responsibilities.duty: Resolving complex technical issues for Truist's Network applications.
Performing problem tracking, diagnosis and root-cause analysis, replication, troubleshooting, and resolution for complex issues.
Responding to issues in a timely manner by receiving and investigating incidents or service tickets.
Analyzing and observing trends with technical issues and developing recommendations for long-term improvements.
Documenting all relevant end-user interactions and steps taken to resolve incidents.
Communicating status of issue resolution to internal customers.
Leading moderately complex projects and participating in larger, more complex initiatives.
Acting as a resource for teammates with less experience.
Having people management responsibilities for a small team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree and five years of experience in development or application support or an equivalent combination of education and work experience.
In-depth knowledge in information systems and ability to identify, apply, and implement best practices.
Understanding of key business processes and competitive strategies related to the IT function.
Ability to plan and manage projects.
Ability to solve complex problems by applying best practices.
Ability to provide direction and mentor less experienced teammates.
Ability to interpret and convey complex, difficult, or sensitive information.
Solid experience working in distributed environments (Windows Linux, Unix etc)
